testcase.name: I can view my favorite songs

testcase.name: I can delete all the songs from my list

testcase.name: I can cancel deleting all songs

testcase.name: Word cloud generation occurs within time limits
testcase.system-out: Given I am logged in........................................................passed And I am on the word cloud homepage.........................................passed When I enter "Taylor Swift" in the artist search field......................passed And I enter "1" in the song count field.....................................passed And I click the "Submit" button.............................................passed Then the word cloud should be generated in less than 1 second...............passed

testcase.name: Word cloud has no filler words
testcase.system-out: Given I am logged in........................................................passed And there is an existing word cloud.........................................passed When the lyrics contain filler words like "ooh".............................passed Then the word cloud should not contain "ooh"................................passed

testcase.name: Word cloud has no stemming
testcase.system-out: Given I am logged in........................................................passed And there is an existing word cloud.........................................passed When the lyrics contains stem words like "killing"..........................passed Then the word cloud should not contain "killing"............................passed

testcase.name: The word cloud displays a maximum of 100 words
testcase.system-out: Given I am logged in........................................................passed And there is an existing word cloud.........................................passed And there are more than 100 words in the lyrics.............................passed Then the word cloud should display no more than 100 words...................passed

testcase.name: Ambiguous artist selection
testcase.system-out: Given I am logged in........................................................passed And I am on the word cloud homepage.........................................passed When I enter "Justin" in the artist search field............................passed And I click the "Submit" button.............................................passed Then I should see a popup with all artists named "Justin" with their photos.passed When I select "Justin Bieber"...............................................passed Then I should see a list of popular songs for "Justin Bieber"...............passed
